title: Skirt
description: horizontal rows of machine embroidered tape in mostly vertical linear patterns divided at 1\"-4\" intervals by narrow horizontal patterns;  top 2 1/2\" band hand embroidered in diamond design on tan background in red, black and white
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
